Plot multiple

Source: R/fn_plot.R
plot_multiple.Rd

plot_multiple() is a Plot function that plots data. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to plot multiple. The function is called for its side effects and does not return a value.

Usage

plot_multiple(
  tsibbles_xx,
  by_value_1L_lgl = F,
  caption_1L_chr = "",
  clinical_vars_chr = make_clinical_vars(),
  keep_cdn_1L_chr = c("All", "Personal", "Provider", "Severity", "Sports"),
  label_x_1L_chr = "",
  label_y_1L_chr = character(0),
  metrics_chr = make_metric_vars(),
  metrics_int = 1:4,
  min_1L_int = 3L,
  prefix_1L_chr = "",
  severity_1L_int = 8L,
  shorten_1L_chr = character(0),
  shorten_1L_lgl = FALSE,
  sports_vars_chr = get_sports_vars(),
  suffix_1L_chr = character(0),
  type_1L_chr = c("main", "seasonal"),
  y_suffix_1L_chr = character(0)
)

Arguments

tsibbles_xx

Tsibbles (an output object of multiple potential types)

by_value_1L_lgl

By value (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

caption_1L_chr

Caption (a character vector of length one), Default: ”

clinical_vars_chr

Clinical variables (a character vector), Default: make_clinical_vars()

keep_cdn_1L_chr

Keep condition (a character vector of length one), Default: c("All", "Personal", "Provider", "Severity", "Sports")

label_x_1L_chr

Label x (a character vector of length one), Default: ”

label_y_1L_chr

Label y (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

metrics_chr

Metrics (a character vector), Default: make_metric_vars()

metrics_int

Metrics (an integer vector), Default: 1:4

min_1L_int

Minimum (an integer vector of length one), Default: 3

prefix_1L_chr

Prefix (a character vector of length one), Default: ”

severity_1L_int

Severity (an integer vector of length one), Default: 8

shorten_1L_chr

Shorten (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

shorten_1L_lgl

Shorten (a logical vector of length one), Default: FALSE

sports_vars_chr

Sports variables (a character vector), Default: get_sports_vars()

suffix_1L_chr

Suffix (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

type_1L_chr

Type (a character vector of length one), Default: c("main", "seasonal")

y_suffix_1L_chr

Y suffix (a character vector of length one), Default: character(0)

Value

No return value, called for side effects.
